CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 29, 1963, pg. 19, reads: "1963 Courier-WAMO Home-A-Rama Exhibitors who were not shown on last week's picture page are shown here... 1. The Natural Gas Companies furnished appliances for the stage demonstrations. Harold Mason, representative is seen in center of stage... All Home-A-Rama Photos (Including last week's) by Charles (Teenie) Harris."
TitMainTitle: Girl wearing WAMO hat seated at organ, with Harold Mason in background on stage with Natural Gas Companies appliance display, at 1963 Pittsburgh Courier - WAMO, Home-A-Rama fair, Syria Mosque
CatSubject_tab: Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Organs---Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
